JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Neighbourhood Copenhagen Airport is seeking a Pizza Chef
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to be part of the exciting pizza restaurant Neighbourhood in Copenhagen Airport?
Are you passionate about creating delicious pizza and providing exceptional service? Do you have experience in a kitchen environment and love working in a team?
If this sounds like you, you might be the Pizza Chef we are looking for!

What will you do?

  • Prepare and cook high-quality pizzas to perfection, ensuring consistency in taste and presentation
  • Manage daily kitchen operations, including food preparation, cooking, and maintaining a clean workspace
  • Ensure guests have a great dining experience by delivering delicious, well-crafted pizzas on time
  • Help create and maintain the menu, suggesting new ideas for seasonal or special pizzas
  • Maintain food safety, hygiene, and health standards in the kitchen
  • Effectively manage kitchen inventory, minimize waste, and ensure supplies are stocked
  • Work closely with team members, offering support and coordination to ensure smooth kitchen operations
  • Strive to improve kitchen efficiency

Who are you?

  • Proven experience as a pizza chef ideally with at least 2 years of experience
  • Passionate about food, particularly pizza, and eager to craft the best possible dishes
  • A team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills
  • Strong understanding of food safety and kitchen hygiene practices
  • Creative, with an eye for detail when it comes to both taste and presentation
  • Willing to adapt and work in a fast-paced environment
  • Business proficiency in English
  • At least one Scandinavian language is desirable
  • Will have to provide documentation and a clear criminal record for the last 5 years to pass security checks to work at the airport. For more information please refer to  https://www.retsinformation.dk/eli/lta/2004/979

What do we offer?

  • A collaborative, friendly, and diverse work culture
  • Competitive salary, benefits and a harmonious work environment
  • Opportunities for learning and growth within the company
  • Flexibility
  • Staff meals and discounts

 

What’s next? If you’re excited to join us on this delicious adventure, apply now! Tell us why you’re the perfect Pizza Chef for our team by sending in your CV and application. We are committed to an inclusive recruitment process and equal opportunity for all candidates, so please avoid using photos in your CV.

Shortlisted applicants will be contacted for an interview. The position will remain open until we find the perfect fit.
